item.title: The Perfect State (What is a State)
item.description: For centuries, people have argued how to produce, distribute and allocate resources to ensure a better society for all. But to get to what a state should be, I ask “What is a State?” Is a state a group of people sharing an identity? Is a state boundaries on a map? Is a state, a god’s authority on Earth? It might be not be easy to define a state in these terms.

item.title: The Perfect State (Introduction)
item.description: Before I delve into my ideas for a perfect state. I would like to introduce these series of articles, which I hopefully can complete to write out my thoughts on administration of a modern state. I write this at 9:15 pm 5th June 2020. The world has been through a pandemic, devastating lives and livelihoods across the worlds. Protests have erupted in the United States over a sad death of an African American.
